description: Look at the iPhone sock.
title: Apple Announces iPhone Pocket: A Phone Cocoon You Can Dangle From Your Shoulder

author: Michael Cripe
description: PlayStation will soon debut its first-ever State of Play Japan, and we’re here to gather all of the highlights.
title: State of Play Japan: Everything Announced (Updating Live)

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: HBO's V for Vendetta series is a reminder that DC can give superhero fans something Marvel can't, or won't, when it comes to superhero adaptations.
title: A V for Vendetta Series Represents DC's Greatest Weapon in the Ongoing War Against Marvel

author: Chris Reed
description: Amazon and Target are running a sale that cuts 40% off the price of this adorable LEGO Christmas Tree. Sale ends Wednesday, November 12.
title: This 2-in-1 LEGO Christmas Tree Set Is on Sale for $27 (Ends Soon)

author: Eric Song
description: Electric scooters starting at $109, eBikes from $251, 3D printers from $137, Nintendo Switch 2, and more.
title: The AliExpress Early Black Friday Sale Starts Now, Up to $140 Off Coupons and 15% Cash Back at Retailmenot

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Games Workshop has sparked shock and anger among Warhammer 40,000 fans after it killed off two main characters from Space Marine 2 via a brief lore update posted on its website.
title: 'Is There Anything More Grimdark Than to Die Offscreen?' — Games Workshop Just Killed Two Space Marine 2 Characters via a Brief Lore Update Post and Warhammer 40,000 Fans Are in Tatters

author: Chris Reed
description: Here's what you need to know if you're planning on shopping for LEGO sets during Black Friday 2025.
title: LEGO Deals I Expect to See During Black Friday Sales

author: Clint Gage
description: Movie review: The Running Man survives but Edgar Wright and Glen Powell get caught between the bleak sci-fi of Stephen King’s novel and the campy satire of the Arnold Schwarzenegger version.
title: The Running Man Review

author: Michael Cripe
description: NetEase Games has published an X-Men animated series-inspired trailer for Marvel Rivals Season 5: Love is a Battlefield, revealing Rogue and Gambit as its newest playable characters.
title: Marvel Rivals Season 5 Channels X-Men Animated Series as Gambit and Rogue Join as Playable Characters

author: Jacob Kienlen
description: Save 50% on an annual subscription and get access to Peacock or Paramount+
title: The Best Black Friday Streaming Deal So Far Is a Walmart+ Subscription

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Marvel Studios has made a casting announcement for upcoming Disney+ series VisionQuest that just might surprise one or two fans.
title: Marvel Disney+ Series VisionQuest Just Got the Most Unlikely of Casting Announcements

author: Christian Wait
description: As of Nov. 11, Samsung’s S90D OLED 4K TVs are up to 60% off, $1,079 for the 65" and $1,497 for the 77" model, both with 144Hz refresh and full HDMI 2.1 support. The ASRock Steel Legend RX 9070 XT GPU has dropped to $619, its lowest price ever, and MSI’s RTX 5070 Ti gaming laptop is $1,299 at Walmart. Meanwhile, Best Buy has the iBuypower RTX 5080 PC for under $2,000, now that's an early Black Friday steal.
title: Deals for Today: Early Black Friday 60% off 65" and 77" Samsung 4K OLED TVs

author: Tom Phillips
description: Former Nintendo of America boss Reggie Fils-Aime has said he "scratched his head a little bit" after seeing the company's first line-up of Switch 2 software.
title: 'When I First Saw That Line-Up, I Scratched My Head a Little Bit': Former Nintendo Exec Reggie Fils-Aimé Shares His Thoughts on Switch 2

author: Tom Phillips
description: LEGO has teased a new Legend of Zelda set for 2026, featuring Link, Princess Zelda and... an ominous silhouette.
title: New Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time LEGO Set For 2026 Looks to Feature Ganon

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: We played the imminent first-person horror game ROUTINE ahead its December 4 release and found its '80's-vision-of-the-future, lunar-moon-base setting intriguing, but we also had a couple of concerns.
title: ROUTINE: The Final Preview – IGN First

author: Lex Briscuso
description: We’re all chomping at the bit for the KPop Demon Hunters sequel film, which, unfortunately for all of us, won’t be released until 2029. However, we can dream and speculate about what the follow-up will actually be about — and the singing voices behind the film’s central KPop girl group, HUNTR/X, are doing the same.
title: The Singing Voices Behind HUNTR/X Know What They Want from KPop Demon Hunters 2

author: Tom Phillips
description: Pokémon Pokopia will cost $70 and only be available physically as a Game-Key Card, it appears — something that has stunned some Nintendo fans.
title: Fans Claim Broken Promises After $70 Pokémon Pokopia Confirmed as First Nintendo-Published Game-Key Card Release

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: The Samsung Galaxy XR headset is now available to buy from Samsung's website, listed for $1,799.99.
title: Samsung Galaxy XR Headset Is Now Available

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Tatsuya Nakadai, beloved star of Japan’s golden age of cinema and a frequent collaborator of Akira Kurosawa, has died aged 92.
title: Beloved Japanese Actor Tatsuya Nakadai, Who Collaborated With Kurosawa and Kobayashi, Dies Aged 92

author: Tom Phillips
description: Fortnite developer Epic Games has detailed how it will soon allow third-party sellers to offer "paid random items" within the game's creator-made modes — something that opens the door to loot boxes, fans have said.
title: Fortnite Fans Say the Game Is Opening the Door to Loot Boxes by Allowing Creator-Made Modes to Sell 'Paid Random Items' — Though Their Sale Is Restricted in Certain Countries, and Sellers Are Required to Disclose Odds

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Fallout 4: Anniversary Edition was meant to act as a celebration of Bethesda’s post-apocalyptic role-playing game on its tenth birthday. But it turns out that things haven’t exactly gone to plan as the update was met with a backlash on Steam.
title: Fallout 4 Anniversary Edition Sparks Backlash as Disgruntled Fans Use Steam Reviews to Express Their Disappointment

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: Comics superstar Brian Michael Bendis is returning to Marvel Comics after seven years away, starting with the anniversary special The Avengers #800.
title: Comics Icon Brian Michael Bendis Returns to Marvel for The Avengers #800

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: 2025 may be quickly winding down, but there are still some very promising new graphic novels hitting the stands before the end of the year. Check out our exclusive preview of Heaven, West Virginia.
title: Heaven, West Virginia Is a Powerful Graphic Novel About Grief and Healing

author: Vikki Blake
description: Modders are hard at work developing an ambitious expansion that will bring Mexico to Red Dead Redemption 2.
title: Ambitious Fan Mod 'Nuevo Paraíso — the Forgotten Frontier' Recreates Mexico in Red Dead Redemption 2 — Check Out the Trailer

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo has just confirmed a release date for Pokémon Pokopia, its promising-looking Animal Crossing-style game for Nintendo Switch 2.
title: Pokémon Pokopia Nintendo Switch 2 Release Date Confirmed

author: Arnold T. Blumberg
description: Now You See Me: Now You Don’t review: More Horsemen, more charm, more paper-thin characters.
title: Now You See Me: Now You Don’t Review

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The Fallout 3 remaster that leaked back in 2023 is still in the works, a new report has claimed.
title: Fallout 3 Remaster Still on the Way, Report Claims

author: Tom Phillips
description: Jurassic Park star Jeff Goldblum has revealed that he's given up eating meat after playing the villainous Wizard of Oz in Wicked.
title: Jurassic Park Star Jeff Goldblum Reveals Why Wicked Made Him Give Up Meat

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: If you ever need to make like Sam Porter and hike through tricky terrain while lugging hefty cargo, Kojima Productions literally has your back, or in this case your knees. Hideo Kojima's studio is partnering with exoskeleton maker Dnsys to release an official Death Stranding 2 On The Beach limited edition exoskeleton to provide knee support.
title: Kojima Productions to Release Actual Wearable Death Stranding 2 Exoskeleton in Latest Collab

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The Pokémon Company announced today that it will open a Pokémon theme park in Tokyo next year. PokéPark KANTO will be the monster-catching series’ first permanent outdoor attraction, and located inside Yomiuriland, Tokyo’s largest theme park.
title: Pokémon to Get First Permanent Theme Park in Tokyo February 2026

author: Vikki Blake
description: Former Bungie developer Chris Sides has called out the term "extraction shooter," saying it's a "terrible" genre name because it doesn't tell the player what to expect from the game.
title: 'It's the Only Genre Where Its Name Is a Mechanic' — Ex-Marathon Dev Explains Why He Really Hates the Term 'Extraction Shooter'

author: Tom Phillips
description: Squid Game actor O Yeong-su has had his sexual misconduct conviction overturned, after previously being given an eight-month suspended prison sentence.
title: 81-Year-Old Squid Game Star Acquitted of Sexual Misconduct Charge

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: It’s a tough time for Bungie and Destiny 2, with parent company Sony saying the studio has failed to meet its sales and user engagement expectations.
title: Sony Says Bungie Hasn’t Brought in as Much Money as It Thought It Would When It Bought the Developer, as Destiny 2 Falls Off a Cliff

author: Tom Phillips
description: A statement posted on Game of Thrones author George R.R. Martin's blog has addressed claims that AI-generated art was used within the new anniversary edition of A Feast For Crows.
title: 'No AI Was Used': George R.R. Martin's Team Responds After Fans Say Game of Thrones Anniversary Edition Uses Generative AI Art, Copies Fan Designs

author: Vikki Blake
description: Arc Raiders has now sold over 4 million copies worldwide less than two weeks since its release date, cementing its commercial success.
title: Arc Raiders Is Officially a Hit With Over 4 Million Copies Sold and a Peak Concurrent Player Count of 700,000 Across All Platforms

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The PlayStation 5 is now up to 84.2 million copies sold after shifting an additional 3.9 million units during the three-month period ending September 30, Sony has announced.
title: PS5 Has Now Officially Outsold Every Xbox Console Ever Released

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo has issued a fresh system software update for the Switch and Switch 2, bringing both consoles' firmware up to Version 21.0.0. Check out the patch notes.
title: Nintendo Switch and Switch 2 System Update 21.0.0 Available — Here Are the Patch Notes

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Ghost of Yotei has sold 3.3 million copies in its first month on sale, Sony has confirmed.
title: Ghost of Yotei Sells 3.3 Million Copies in Its First Month on Sale, Sony Confirms

author: PatchIGN
title: IGN AU Retrospective: PlayStation Turns 30 in Australia

description: Up to 144Hz refresh rate, perfect for gaming on a PlayStation 5 console.
title: Get a Brand New 65" Samsung S90 4K OLED TV for $1080, or a 77" for $1498 Ahead of Black Friday

description: Here's a look at all the DC movies and series currently in the works, along with a few whose fates may be in jeopardy.
title: Upcoming New DC Movies and TV Shows: 2025 Release Dates and Beyond

author: Jim Vejvoda
description: DC Studios and HBO Max is developing a Superman spin-off series titled DC Crime, which will star Superman's Skyler Gisondo as The Daily Planet’s Jimmy Olsen. American Vandal’s Tony Yacenda and Dan Perrault are the showrunners.
title: DC Crime TV Series in Development Starring Skyler Gisondo’s Jimmy Olsen, Gorilla Grodd as Villain

author: Eric Song
description: A whole lot of gaming performance for the price.
title: The Powerful MSI Vector AMD Ryzen 9 HX RTX 5070 Ti Gaming Laptop Drops to $1,299.99 for Black Friday
